mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT up.* FROM upms_permission up LEFT JOIN upms_role_permission urp ON urp.`permission_id` = up.`id` LEFT JOIN upms_role ur ON ur.`id` = urp.`role_id` LEFT JOIN upms_user_role uur ON uur.`role_id` = ur.`id` WHERE 1 = 1 ${ew.sqlSegment} UNION SELECT DISTINCT up.* FROM upms_permission up LEFT JOIN upms_user_permission uur ON uur.`permission_id` = up.`id` LEFT JOIN upms_role ur ON 1 = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ) a ORDER BY a.orders
SELECT uu.*, ud.`dept_name` FROM upms_user uu LEFT JOIN upms_dept ud ON ud.`id` = uu.`dept_id` WHERE 1 = 1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ORDER BY uu.`ctime` DESC
SELECT uu.*, ud.`dept_name` FROM upms_user uu LEFT JOIN upms_dept ud ON ud.`id` = uu.`dept_id` WHERE 1 = 1 AND uu.`id` = '${id}'
